Blog.post: I am puttin to much time in at work this payday. 92 hours in 2 weeks is too much. And what was I thinking agreeing to work wed and thur days and then fri and sat night shifts?! God I hope I can stay awake for this...

ok now that I have figured out how to post im in business. lol. anyway my other thoughts are posted. But this is the news of the day I did my weigh in and I was 168, today am 164 I still have 50 pounds to go but its a start. L and G havent given me their weights yet. Ok G just gave me hers shes at 151. And she wants to loose 20. And L is at 157 and she also wants to loose 20. And so we are off like a herd of screaming turtles.
I have the pleasure of working in my favorite place. Life is Good!
Went to see Riddick. It was pretty good. Am even using a line from it with my chars that I play on Everquest. Stopped using the gentle lead with Max hes walking better. But he still jumps...
Went and bought Max one of those gentle leaders so he wont pull on the leash anymore. Boy does he hate it! lol Today I'm going to a movie with a friend.

Thank you Herb for your comment. Its kinda nice to know that other people are feeling the same way. Today's topic is....lets see..Some peoples children!! Ok do you folks have the slightest idea how your "lil darlins" act when you arent around!? I hear language out of kids mouths that would make a sailor blush! And I mean children under 13 btw. I see then throwing rocks at cars driving by on the street. And can you please teach them to actually put their trash IN a trash can?! OK OK I'm done ...for now.

I was just walking Max and I wonder....WHY IS IT THAT PEOPLE WITH HUGE DOGS LEAVE THE POOP??!!!! OMG I see piles that look like a person dumped there! Why? Seems like the bigger the dog the less the owner is willing to clean up after it. And in the Arizona heat, it smells very bad and then theres all these flies all over it. Its just gross. PICK UP AFTER YOUR DOG OR DONT HAVE A DOG!! sheesh....

Well a couple of people I havent seen lately ran into me and commented that I am lookin like I am losing weight! So that is a good thing. Bad thing is I dont feel like I am....But I am still doing the low carb thing. Gotta go shoppin today cause I threw up before work today and realized that since I ran out of food and have been living out of the 76 that Ive been living on beef jerkey for 3 days.
Well here I sit at midnight. Just got up from a nap. One of the good things about choosing your schedule. Going to lunch with a friend later today. Other than that I have no life.

Well I went to look at Datefreenow.com...not terribly impressed as there are no men on there from AZ at all. Well in my chosen age range anyway. Will check it out again in the future so thanks for the suggestion. Not much going on in my life. nothing worth talkin about anyway.
Thank goodness. After 3 weeks of look for a job I finally landed one this am. Don't start unti Aug 9th but at least it's there. And thank you to whomever suggested datefree.com I'll check it out now.
Ok Ok I read your post. Thanks for reading my drival. As you know I was a bit depressed but as with all things this too shall pass. OH...new news, signed up on eharmony.com. Wish me luck.

Well I've been looking at some of the other blogs. Is it me or is this blog thing mostly bored school kids? And I am sorry but some of you need to pay more attention in English class!!! Your spelling is horrible. But anyway saw some that were pretty good, mostly from Australia (go figure). I have a friend in Australia haven't spoken to him lately tho. But Good God I need a life! All I do is work, walk the puppy, play EQ, and sleep. No wonder I can't find a guy to hang out with.

Well here I am sitting at work keeping on eye on our veterans and thinking. Thinking about the one that got away again, thinking about why my life is where it is, which is basically nowhere, and thinking what can I do to change the way I'm viewing things right now. I wonder where that girl went who felt that she was worthy, felt that she could handle anything, and knew that she was loved. Why do I feel now like nothing I do Is good enough? Men don't stay, and I know that it is something I have done or not done. I am not skinny enough, smart enough, charming enough or something...Even the ONE from my past that I wanted more than anything to have love me back has stopped making time for me. I am simply sick and tired of being alone. I don't want a husband. Just a date now and then...Why am I not good enough just the way I am? Anyway nevermind, I am just getting some stuff off my chest I'll get over it.

I gave Max to a friend tonight. And I am torn up about it. I think he will be happier there because someone will be home with him 24/7 but I also think I did it because I don't want the responsibilty. And I REALLY hate feeling like I gave up. Hoping venting here will make me feel better. But he looked happy when they walked off and I see her almost everyday so I can check on him. Sheesh...ok....shutting up now. I am just trying to convince myself I did the right thing and only time will tell.
